title: The nation's top health official has been a background player for much of his tenure. He says that's about to change. - CNN
content: The nation's top health official has been a background player for much of his tenure. He says that's about to change.  CNNView Full Coverage on Google News
description: Stung by accusations that he's been absent during a once-in-a-century public health crisis, Xavier Becerra -- the country's top health official -- tells CNN he's looking to step into a bigger public role as part of a reset a year into dealing with the dominant issue in his portfolio.
